tool_description: High performance API for stocks & ETFs. You can get intraday, daily, weekly and monthly historical market data.
name: APIStocks
title: APIStocks

api_list.name: daily
api_list.description: Get Daily historical data for Stocks and ETFs.

api_list.name: monthly
api_list.description: Get monthly historical data for stocks and ETFs.

api_list.name: weekly
api_list.description: Get weekly historical data for stocks and ETFs.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Upper case Stock or ETF symbol.

api_list.name: intraday
api_list.description: Get intraday price for stocks and ETFs.

optional_parameters.name: maxreturn
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of items(data points) to be returned. Default is 1000. Maximum value is 1000.

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter. Default value is \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"5min\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\". Supported values: 1min, 5min, 15min, 30min, 60min.
